content:
Category_Id          Name        Description                                                                                                     Slot
-------------------  -------------------  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
0f954ce00e084429bd6  Compose Email        Allows the user to create and send a new email to any desired recipient.                                                 e21a381dbd564f32acb, 4bd3f13326a44d6e96a, 5c5d88c2e1b044c78a5
4799a7bc3c6347d5b37  Restore Backup       Intent to initiate the restore of a previous backup                                                                      2a617bc66ce64759941, 682a8a55ff60460fa46, c887b0ad3b4447a6951
0ceb19b61b0d42109b6  Email Account Setup  Allows the user to set up a new email account, including creating a new email address and configuring account settings.  03a8260499314cb1aa0, 3cb47f0401534f0281d, b2923cb36abd425a8e4, 39696a51ee424c36bb4

Identifier            Entity_Name      Entity_Description                                                            Example_values
-------------------  ---------------  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
e21a381dbd564f32acb  to               The recipient's email address.
4bd3f13326a44d6e96a  subject          The subject line of the email.
5c5d88c2e1b044c78a5  body             The content of the email.
2a617bc66ce64759941  backup_location  The location where the backup is stored.
682a8a55ff60460fa46  backup_date      The date when the backup was created.
c887b0ad3b4447a6951  file_type        The type of files to be restored.
03a8260499314cb1aa0  email_provider   The email service provider for the account being set up.
3cb47f0401534f0281d  full_name        The user's full name as they would like it to appear in their email account.
b2923cb36abd425a8e4  email_address    The desired email address for the new account.                                john.doe@gmail.com, jane.smith@outlook.com, alice.johnson@yahoo.com, bob.williams@icloud.com
39696a51ee424c36bb4  password         The user's chosen password for the email account.
